mapper.select: SELECT boardNum, boardAuthor, boardDate, boardTitle, (SELECT COUNT(clicklikeId) FROM likes WHERE boards.boardNum = likes.articleNum ) AS boardLIKE, (SELECT COUNT(commentsNum) FROM comments WHERE boards.boardNum = comments.commentsArticleNum ) AS cntComments FROM boards GROUP BY boards.boardNum ORDER BY boards.boardNum DESC;
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO boards (boardTitle, boardContent, boardAuthor, boardLike) VALUES ( #{boardTitle}, #{boardContent}, #{boardAuthor}, 0)
mapper.select: SELECT boardNum, boardAuthor, boardDate, boardTitle, (SELECT COUNT(clicklikeId) FROM likes WHERE boards.boardNum = likes.articleNum ) AS boardLIKE, (SELECT COUNT(commentsNum) FROM comments WHERE boards.boardNum = comments.commentsArticleNum ) AS cntComments FROM boards WHERE boardNum = #{boardNum}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM likes WHERE articleNum=#{articleNum} AND clicklikeId=#{clicklikeId}
